svg.text: The Core Insight: Development as Geometric Navigation

text.tspan: LLM development is optimization in high-dimensional embedding space S âŠ† â„â¿. Each prompt iteration
is a transformation Ïƒ â†’ Ïƒ' through this space. Golf provides the endemic ontology to make this
navigation intuitive: terrain = confidence landscape, shots = semantic transformations, convergence =
reaching the Îµ-ball around goal g. Category theory provides formal structure ensuring compositionality.
